channel.title: | TranqualityX | 718/742 | VPS | 24/7 UP TIME |
channel.description:
[size=36pt] Tranquality | 24/7 | 718/742
[/size]
TranqualityX Hello, I would like to welcome you to TranqualityX's google / rune-server /
moparscape page.
[SIZE=3]What has changed? We have updated from 718/728 to 718/742, this has brought a lot more features
into the game and will make the experience a lot better for the players. I have been developing the server for a while on and off since we was closed,
so it is packed with content[/SIZE].
List of Features and specs
- VPS Hosted 4GB - 24/7 - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 138 combat, summoning counts - Constant Updates - Professional and active Staff - Active Clean Forums - Working lodestones - Old and new Runescape Armor - Working Vote & Rewards - Automatic Donating System! - DonatorZone (with shops)
How to play -
Forums -[url=http://www.tranqualityx.co.uk/]
http://www.tranqualityx.co.uk/[/url] Donate - [url=http://www.tranqualityx.co.uk/donate/]
http://www.tranqualityx.co.uk/donate/[/url] Vote -[url=http://www.tranqualityx.co.uk/vote/#?step=1]
http://www.tranqualityx.co.uk/vote/#?step=1[/url] Highscores - [url=http://www.tranqualityx.co.uk/highscores/highscores.php]
http://www.tranqualityx.co.uk/highscores/highscores.php[/url]
Clients -
Webclient - [url=http://www.tranqualityx.co.uk/webclient.html]
http://www.tranqualityx.co.uk/webclient.html[/url] Client.jar -[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/77631916/TranqualityX.jar]
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/77631916/TranqualityX.jar[/url] Client.rar - [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/77631916/TranqualityX.rar]
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/77631916/TranqualityX.rar[/url]
Below is a list of More features.
- Loyalty point system with shop (300 points every 30mins) - Various shops. - Squeal of fortune. - Bone's on altar. - Friendly staff. - Hunter. - All the GodWars Dungeons. - Fully working Nex. - Curses, ancients etc. - Quests to be added soon. - Working Revenants. - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Custom Dung! - Working chaotics - Working Flowers and Dicing - Money pouch Of course - 23/ 25 working skill's! - Working clan wars! - Great staff and owner's! - fully working slayer and slayer tower! - Awesome Home - Auto-Vote4Cash - Auto-Donate - Great PvP and switching - Owner takes all ideas into consideration. - Perfect switching - unique home - & So much more!
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/zkkbop.png[/img]
Contruction Base [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2whfg95.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/16m1wlw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/35n1zz5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/15xptec.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/xemo0l.png[/img]
Noob Training! [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/308kzef.png[/img]
Working Dom Tower! [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2wcjozc.png[/img]
Credits Me - Jamie Ben's Project Matrix

Hello, I would like to welcome you to TranqualityX’s google / rune-server /

We have updated from 718/728 to 718/742, this has brought a lot more features

I have been developing the server for a while on and off since we was closed,

so it is packed with content[/SIZE].
